bug.author: Arafat4341
bug.description: Getting this error while running demo TTS notebook colab: <denchmark-code>AssertionError: The NVIDIA driver on your system is too old (found version 10010). Please update your GPU driver by downloading and installing a new version from the URL: http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx Alternatively, go to: https://pytorch.org to install a PyTorch version that has been compiled with your version of the CUDA driver. </denchmark-code>
